Home » 29Dhs Dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷi » 2 Niddesa » 2.3 Nikkhepakaṇḍa » 2.3.3 Suttantikadukanikkhepa
2.3.3.13 Antavādiṭṭhiduka
Niddesa
Nikkhepakaṇḍa
Suttantikadukanikkhepa
Antavādiṭṭhiduka
1324.
2029Tattha katamā antavā diṭṭhi? Antavā attā ca loko cāti, yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ…pe…  vipariyāsaggāho—  ayaṃ vuccati antavā diṭṭhi.
1325.
2030Tattha katamā anantavā diṭṭhi? Anantavā attā ca loko cāti, yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ…pe…  vipariyāsaggāho—  ayaṃ vuccati anantavā diṭṭhi.
